'''Forest Piglet''' is a type of boar. Unlike their [[Forest Boar|adult counterpart]], they will not attack the player. They are also not recorded in the [[Archive]], nor are they capturable with an [[Omni-Ubiquity Net]].

==Drops==
{{Card|Raw Meat|2}}
